title: Grilled Filet Mignon with Blue Cheese Butter

Ingredients.4: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.6: 2 teaspoons canola oil, or as needed

Directions.1: Mash butter, blue cheese, and thyme together in a small bowl until well combined. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

Directions.2: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.

Directions.3: Brush steaks with oil and season with salt and pepper.

Directions.4: Cook steaks on the preheated grill until firm and reddish-pink and juicy in the center, about 5 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 130 degrees F (54 degrees C).

Directions.5: Transfer steaks to a platter and top with some of the butter mixture. Let them rest for 5 minutes before serving.
